properties.displayName: _CSGP: Local Account Creation on one endpoint
properties.description:
Alerts when a local account has been created on an endpoint. 
Check the VPSP queue for any related tickets: https://servicedesk.costargroup.com/projects/VPSP/queues

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat:
Alert Name: Local Account Creation on one endpoint

Description: This rule detects when a local user account is created on an endpoint. 

Handling Guidance: Contact the individual who created the account and determine what the business purpose of the account is for. Is this intentional activity? Is there a ticket associated with this activity that can be referenced?
